EmailTemplate.name: 06-30-21 BNK Connect Webinar Series Follow-up.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: NCR Webinar- Adapting to a Digital First Structure
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Thank you for registering for our NCR Webinar - Adapting to a Digital First Structure: How consumer behaviors are changing banking technology. If you were not able to join the session live don’t worry you can access the recording of the presentation here <[[https://ncr.webex.com/ncr/lsr.php?RCID=9421e7108113f5ddd1f025195b0d3c93]]> and download a copy of presenter slides <[[https://go.ncr.com/rs/605-BQY-740/images/29Jun2021_NCR Connect Webinar_Adapting to a Digital First Structure.pdf]]>. If you attended the session, we hope you felt the content was valuable and enjoyed the input from the NCR experts on our approach and direction. Please consider helping us gain some information as to how we can improve these sessions by participating in this short survey <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/RZ6XYZB]]>. We look forward to your participation on further NCR Webinars. <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
